projects.title: Job listings
projects.description: List of job positions with filter made with vanilla JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Webpack and BEM.

projects.title: Typemaster Landing
projects.description: Responsive landing page with CSS grid and flexbox. It was packaged with webpack for optimization.

projects.title: Bootcamp Testimonials

projects.title: Article Preview Component
projects.description: HTML and CSS with responsive design. It adds a tooltip made with pseudo-classes and a tiny interaction with JS.
